name: Cozy (A_Sandwich)
description:
Godot Wild Jam #40 Entry:

Move with WASD, chop trees with "E", plant trees by pressing "E" next to an empty plot of land while you have a seed in your inventory, and feed the fire by pressing "E" next to it when you have logs in your inventory. 

To win, simply plant 15 trees! You can keep playing even after you win though!
